import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Inverter" and
    r.endpoint == "Power" and
    r.unit == "W"
  )
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1s) }))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Produzione"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","Produzione"])
  |> yield(name: "produzione_last_W")

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)
stop  = date.add(d: 1d, to: start)

dailyDeltaWh = (tables=<-) => {
  f = tables
    |> first()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "start")

  l = tables
    |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "end")

  return union(tables: [f, l])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["device_id"], columnKey: ["kind"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r.end) - float(v: r.start) }))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value < 0.0 then 0.0 else r._value }))
    |> group(columns: [])
    |> sum(column: "_value")
}

from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Inverter" and
    r.endpoint == "Total Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> dailyDeltaWh()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _time: date.truncate(
      t: if date.millisecond(t: now()) >= 500 then date.add(d: 1s, to: now()) else now(),
      unit: 1s
    )
  }))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "produzione_oggi_wh"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","produzione_oggi_wh"])
  |> yield(name: "produzione_fotovoltaica_oggi_wh")

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)

first = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Meter" and
    r.endpoint == "Export Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> first()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "start_wh"})
  |> set(key: "k", value: "x")

last = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Meter" and
    r.endpoint == "Export Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "end_wh"})
  |> set(key: "k", value: "x")

join(tables: {first: first, last: last}, on: ["k"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r.end_wh) - float(v: r.start_wh) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1s) }))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "immissione_oggi_Wh"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "immissione_oggi_Wh"])
  |> yield(name: "immissione_oggi_Wh")

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)
stop  = date.add(d: 1d, to: start)

// Delta giornaliero (last - first) per device, clamp ≥0 e somma
dailyDeltaWh = (tables=<-) => {
  f = tables
    |> first()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "start")

  l = tables
    |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "end")

  return union(tables: [f, l])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["device_id"], columnKey: ["kind"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r.end) - float(v: r.start) }))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value < 0.0 then 0.0 else r._value }))
    |> group(columns: [])
    |> sum(column: "_value")
}

// Produzione (Inverter → Total Energy, Wh)
prod_val = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Inverter" and
    r.endpoint == "Total Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> dailyDeltaWh()

// Import (Meter → Import Energy, Wh)
imp_val = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Meter" and
    r.endpoint == "Import Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> dailyDeltaWh()

// Export (Meter → Export Energy, Wh) → negativo
exp_val = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Meter" and
    r.endpoint == "Export Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> dailyDeltaWh()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: -r._value }))

// Consumo = Import − Export + Produzione (Wh)
union(tables: [imp_val, prod_val, exp_val])
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "consumo_wh"})
  |> yield(name: "consumo_totale_oggi_Wh")

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

today_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)

// Ottieni tutti i dati di oggi
all_data = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "Import Energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

// Calcola min e max (che corrispondono a primo e ultimo per contatori crescenti)
all_data
  |> reduce(
    identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, count: 0},
    fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      first: if accumulator.count == 0 then r._value else accumulator.first,
      last: r._value,
      count: accumulator.count + 1
    })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: now(),
    _value: (r.last - r.first),
    _field: "prelievo_oggi_kwh",
    prima_lettura: r.first,
    ultima_lettura: r.last
  }))

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

today_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)

// Energia importata
importata = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "Import Energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> reduce(
    identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, count: 0},
    fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      first: if accumulator.count == 0 then r._value else accumulator.first,
      last: r._value,
      count: accumulator.count + 1
    })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    _time: now(),
    _value: (r.last - r.first),
    _field: "importata" 
  }))

// Energia prodotta
prodotta = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "Total Energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> reduce(
    identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, count: 0},
    fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      first: if accumulator.count == 0 then r._value else accumulator.first,
      last: r._value,
      count: accumulator.count + 1
    })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    _time: now(),
    _value: (r.last - r.first),
    _field: "prodotta" 
  }))

// Energia esportata
esportata = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "Export Energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> reduce(
    identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, count: 0},
    fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      first: if accumulator.count == 0 then r._value else accumulator.first,
      last: r._value,
      count: accumulator.count + 1
    })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    _time: now(),
    _value: (r.last - r.first),
    _field: "esportata" 
  }))

// Union + Pivot per combinare tutti i dati
union(tables: [importata, prodotta, esportata])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: now(),
    autoconsumo_wh: r.prodotta - r.esportata,
    consumo_totale_wh: r.importata + (r.prodotta - r.esportata),
    "Perc_Prelievo_OGGI": if (r.importata + (r.prodotta - r.esportata)) > 0.0 then (r.importata / (r.importata + (r.prodotta - r.esportata))) * 100.0 else 0.0,
    "Prelievo_Wh_Debug": r.importata,
    "Autoconsumo_Wh_Debug": r.prodotta - r.esportata,
    "Consumo_Totale_Wh_Debug": r.importata + (r.prodotta - r.esportata),
    _field: "percentuale_prelievo"
  }))

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)

base = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Meter" and
    r.endpoint == "Import Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: [])  // singola serie

// Primo campione non-zero, ordinato per tempo
f = base
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value and r._value > 0.0)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> limit(n: 1)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value","_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "primo_oggi_wh", _time: "t_primo"})
  |> set(key: "k", value: "x")

// Ultimo campione di oggi
l = base
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value","_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "ultimo_oggi_wh", _time: "t_ultimo"})
  |> set(key: "k", value: "x")

// Delta ultimo − primo (Wh)
delta = join(tables: {f: f, l: l}, on: ["k"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r.ultimo_oggi_wh) - float(v: r.primo_oggi_wh) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value < 0.0 then 0.0 else r._value }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: date.truncate(t: r.t_ultimo, unit: 1s) }))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "prelievo_oggi_wh"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","prelievo_oggi_wh"])

// Costo del prelievo (EUR) = (Wh / 1000) * prezzo_kWh
costo = delta
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (float(v: r.prelievo_oggi_wh) / 1000.0) * float(v: ${price}) }))
  // Se non usi variabile Grafana, sostituisci la riga sopra con:
  // |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (float(v: r.prelievo_oggi_wh) / 1000.0) * 0.25 }))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "costo_prelievo_oggi"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","costo_prelievo_oggi"])

// Output
delta |> yield(name: "prelievo_oggi_wh")
costo |> yield(name: "costo_prelievo_oggi")

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)
stop  = date.add(d: 1d, to: start)

// Somma potenza AC degli inverter (W) ogni 5s, senza smussare
inv_total = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Inverter" and
    r.endpoint == "Power" and
    r.unit == "W"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])

// Picco massimo giornaliero (W) con timestamp del picco
inv_total
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> max(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "picco_w"})
  |> yield(name: "picco_produzione_oggi_W")

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

today_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)

inverter_data = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

meter_data = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

join(tables: {inverter: inverter_data, meter: meter_data}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _value: if r._value_meter >= 0.0 then r._value_inverter - r._value_meter else r._value_inverter + (r._value_meter * -1.0)
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: now(),
    "Picco_Massimo_Consumo_OGGI": r._value,
    _field: "picco_consumo_oggi"
  }))

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)
stop  = date.add(d: 1d, to: start)

// Delta giornaliero (last - first) per device, clamp ≥0 e somma
dailyDeltaWh = (tables=<-) => {
  f = tables
    |> first()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "start")

  l = tables
    |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "end")

  return union(tables: [f, l])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["device_id"], columnKey: ["kind"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r.end) - float(v: r.start) }))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value < 0.0 then 0.0 else r._value }))
    |> group(columns: [])
    |> sum(column: "_value")
}

// Produzione (Inverter → Total Energy, Wh)
prod_val = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Inverter" and
    r.endpoint == "Total Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> dailyDeltaWh()

// Export (Meter → Export Energy, Wh)
exp_val = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Meter" and
    r.endpoint == "Export Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> dailyDeltaWh()

// Autoconsumo = Produzione − Export (Wh), clamp ≥0
union(tables: [
    prod_val,
    exp_val |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: -r._value }))
  ])
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value < 0.0 then 0.0 else r._value }))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "autoconsumo_oggi_wh"})
  |> yield(name: "autoconsumo_oggi_Wh")

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

today_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)

// Energia importata (prelievo)
importata = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "Import Energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> reduce(
    identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, count: 0},
    fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      first: if accumulator.count == 0 then r._value else accumulator.first,
      last: r._value,
      count: accumulator.count + 1
    })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    _time: now(),
    _value: (r.last - r.first),
    _field: "importata" 
  }))

// Energia prodotta
prodotta = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "Total Energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> reduce(
    identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, count: 0},
    fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      first: if accumulator.count == 0 then r._value else accumulator.first,
      last: r._value,
      count: accumulator.count + 1
    })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    _time: now(),
    _value: (r.last - r.first),
    _field: "prodotta" 
  }))

// Energia esportata
esportata = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "Export Energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> reduce(
    identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, count: 0},
    fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      first: if accumulator.count == 0 then r._value else accumulator.first,
      last: r._value,
      count: accumulator.count + 1
    })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    _time: now(),
    _value: (r.last - r.first),
    _field: "esportata" 
  }))

// Union + Pivot per combinare tutti i dati
union(tables: [importata, prodotta, esportata])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: now(),
    autoconsumo_wh: r.prodotta - r.esportata,
    consumo_totale_wh: r.importata + (r.prodotta - r.esportata),
    "Perc_Autoconsumo_OGGI": if (r.importata + (r.prodotta - r.esportata)) > 0.0 then ((r.prodotta - r.esportata) / (r.importata + (r.prodotta - r.esportata))) * 100.0 else 0.0,
    "Autoconsumo_Wh_Debug": r.prodotta - r.esportata,
    "Consumo_Totale_Wh_Debug": r.importata + (r.prodotta - r.esportata),
    "Production_Wh_Debug": r.prodotta,
    "Export_Wh_Debug": r.esportata,
    _field: "percentuale_autoconsumo"
  }))

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)
stop  = date.add(d: 1d, to: start)

// Delta giornaliero (last - first) per device, clamp ≥0 e somma
dailyDeltaWh = (tables=<-) => {
  f = tables
    |> first()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "start")

  l = tables
    |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "end")

  return union(tables: [f, l])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["device_id"], columnKey: ["kind"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r.end) - float(v: r.start) }))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value < 0.0 then 0.0 else r._value }))
    |> group(columns: [])
    |> sum(column: "_value")
}

// Produzione (Inverter → Total Energy, Wh)
prod_val = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Inverter" and
    r.endpoint == "Total Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> dailyDeltaWh()

// Export (Meter → Export Energy, Wh)
exp_val = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Meter" and
    r.endpoint == "Export Energy" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> dailyDeltaWh()

// Autoconsumo (Wh) = Produzione − Export, clamp ≥ 0
autoconsumo = union(tables: [
    prod_val,
    exp_val |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: -r._value }))
  ])
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value < 0.0 then 0.0 else r._value }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1s) }))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "autoconsumo_oggi_wh"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","autoconsumo_oggi_wh"])

// Costo Autoconsumo (EUR) = (Wh / 1000) * prezzo_kWh
Risparmio_autoconsumo = autoconsumo
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (float(v: r.autoconsumo_oggi_wh) / 1000.0) * float(v: ${price}) }))
  // Se non usi variabile Grafana, usa un numero fisso:
  // |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (float(v: r.autoconsumo_oggi_wh) / 1000.0) * 0.25 }))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Risparmio_autoconsumo_oggi"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","Risparmio_autoconsumo_oggi"])

// Output
autoconsumo       |> yield(name: "autoconsumo_oggi_Wh")
Risparmio_autoconsumo |> yield(name: "Risparmio_autoconsumo_oggi")

  |> range(start: startOfYear, stop: endOfYear)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "api" and r["_field"] == "Meter" and r["endpoint"] == "site_energy_details")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric"] == "Production" or r["metric"] == "Consumption" or r["metric"] == "SelfConsumption" or r["metric"] == "Purchased" or r["metric"] == "FeedIn")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: true, offset: -1s)
  |> fill(value: 0.0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
      if r.metric == "Production" then "Produzione"
      else if r.metric == "Consumption" then "Consumo"
      else if r.metric == "SelfConsumption" then "Autoconsumo"
      else if r.metric == "Purchased" then "Prelievo"
      else if r.metric == "FeedIn" then "Immissione"
      else r._field
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._time < endOfYear)
  |> drop(columns: ["metric", "_start", "_stop", "endpoint", "unit", "_measurement"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "api")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "site_energy_day")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
      r with 
      year: string(v: date.year(t: r._time)),
      month: date.month(t: r._time)
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "year", "month"])
  |> group(columns: ["year", "month"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      month_name: if r.month == 1 then "Gennaio"
        else if r.month == 2 then "Febbraio"
        else if r.month == 3 then "Marzo"
        else if r.month == 4 then "Aprile"
        else if r.month == 5 then "Maggio"
        else if r.month == 6 then "Giugno"
        else if r.month == 7 then "Luglio"
        else if r.month == 8 then "Agosto"
        else if r.month == 9 then "Settembre"
        else if r.month == 10 then "Ottobre"
        else if r.month == 11 then "Novembre"
        else "Dicembre"
  }))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["month", "month_name"], columnKey: ["year"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["month"])
  |> drop(columns: ["month"])

import "timezone"
import "date"
import "array"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

// Query dati reali
data = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "web")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Optimizer group")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "PRODUCTION_POWER")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0.0)

// Conta quanti dati ci sono
count = data |> count() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

// Se non ci sono dati, crea un punto fittizio a 0
dummy = array.from(rows: [{
  _time: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d),
  _value: 0.0,
  device_id: "dummy",
  _field: "Optimizer group",
  endpoint: "PRODUCTION_POWER"
}])

// Usa dati reali se esistono, altrimenti dummy
result = if exists count._value and count._value > 0 then data else dummy

result
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      _field: r.device_id
  }))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "timezone"
import "date"
import "array"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

// Conta dati grezzi prima di aggregare
raw_data = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "web")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Optimizer group")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "PRODUCTION_POWER")

count_check = raw_data 
  |> count() 
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

// Query dati aggregati
data = raw_data
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0.0)

// Se non ci sono dati, crea un punto fittizio a 0
dummy = array.from(rows: [{
  _time: v.timeRangeStart,
  _value: 0.0,
  device_id: "dummy",
  _field: "Optimizer group",
  endpoint: "PRODUCTION_POWER"
}])

// Usa dati reali se esistono, altrimenti dummy
result = if exists count_check._value and count_check._value > 0 then data else dummy

result
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      _field: r.device_id
  }))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

// Fattore emissioni: 0.4 kg CO2 per kWh prodotto
emission_factor_kg_per_kwh = 0.4

// Produzione (kWh)
prod = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r._measurement == "api" and 
      r._field == "Meter" and 
      r.endpoint == "site_energy_details" and 
      r.metric == "Production"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _j: "k", Produzione: r._value / 1000.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_j", "Produzione"])

// Immissione (kWh)
feed = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r._measurement == "api" and 
      r._field == "Meter" and 
      r.endpoint == "site_energy_details" and 
      r.metric == "FeedIn"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _j: "k", Immissione: r._value / 1000.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_j", "Immissione"])

// Prelievo (kWh)
purch = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r._measurement == "api" and 
      r._field == "Meter" and 
      r.endpoint == "site_energy_details" and 
      r.metric == "Purchased"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _j: "k", Prelievo: r._value / 1000.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_j", "Prelievo"])

// Consumo (kWh)
cons = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r._measurement == "api" and 
      r._field == "Meter" and 
      r.endpoint == "site_energy_details" and 
      r.metric == "Consumption"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _j: "k", Consumo: r._value / 1000.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_j", "Consumo"])

// Join a catena su _j
j1 = join(tables: {a: prod, b: feed}, on: ["_j"])
j2 = join(tables: {a: j1, b: purch}, on: ["_j"])
j3 = join(tables: {a: j2, b: cons}, on: ["_j"])

// Derivati: Autoconsumo (kWh) e Emissioni CO2 Evitate (kg)
j3
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      Autoconsumo: r.Consumo - r.Prelievo,
      EmissioniCO2Evitate: r.Produzione * emission_factor_kg_per_kwh
  }))
  |> rename(columns: {EmissioniCO2Evitate: "Emissioni CO2 Evitate"})
  |> keep(columns: ["Produzione", "Immissione", "Prelievo", "Consumo", "Autoconsumo", "Emissioni CO2 Evitate"])

from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api" and r._field == "Meter" and r.endpoint == "site_energy_details" and r.metric == "Production")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 }))

from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api" and r._field == "Meter" and r.endpoint == "site_energy_details" and r.metric == "FeedIn")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 }))
